name: Final Kick Goal Soccer
description:
Final Kick Goal Soccer is very addictive and challenging game.A very eye catching and friendly environments with supporters flick shoot.Take training with this very realistic football game which can say its soccer football shooter game.
How to play:
- Flick the football to kick for gool.
- Swipe with finger to adjust the direction of the ball when it is in the air
- Indication of curve ball to show the actual trevelling path.
- Zooming effects
